data.author: [ERA] AidasP
data.body:
## TOURNAMENTS
Competitive finally arrives on Project Era!

*Grab the Tournaments role in our Discord guild to remain up-to-date with every tournament news!*

Over the next week, we'll be hosting **Practice Solo**, **Practice Duo** and weekly **Weekend Night Fortnite** tournaments.


### **Practice Solo - Daily Trials**
- Session 1: Jan 22nd 6PM-11PM UTC
- Session 2: Jan 23rd 6PM-11PM UTC
- Session 3: Jan 24th 6PM-11PM UTC


### **Practice Duo - Daily Trials**
- Session 1: Jan 25th 6PM-11PM UTC

### **Weekend Night Fortnite**
- Session 1: Every Friday 6PM-11PM UTC
- Session 2: Every Saturday 6PM-11PM UTC
- Session 3: Every Sunday 6PM-11PM UTC

## WEEK 5
*Week 5* quests are now available for you to complete! 

## 14 DAYS OF FORTNITE, WEEK 3 & WEEK 4 CHALLENGES FIXES
Broken challenges from *14 Days Of Fortnite*, *Week 3* or *Week 4* challenge bundles have been fixed or autocompleted.

data.author: [ERA] danii
data.body:
# WEEK 2 CHALLENGES & FIXES 
*Week 2* challenges are now available!  
# 14 DAYS OF FORTNITE CHALLENGES FIXES  
* **Sgt. Winter** challenges have been fixed.
* **Fly through golden rings in an X-4 Stormwing plane** has been fixed.
* **Hit a player with a snowball in different matches** has been fixed.
# FIXED PROGRESSION 
We have also fixed some accounts not being able to progress (Battle Pass, Levels..)
# NEW YEAR EVENT 
A short **mini-event** will take place on **January 1st, 2024**, for each timezone (the event will replay every hour).

Happy holidays from the Project Era team

data.author: [ERA] AidasP
data.body:
**Creative** is now available along with **14 Days of Fortnite** Challenges!

Creative is currently in **BETA**. We currently feature:
* Island saving
* Devices, prefabs
* Minigames

The following features do not yet work:
* Editing island permissions
* Choosing a different island preset. The default preset is currently enforced.
* Island resetting

Due to the early stage of development in which creative is in, you may encounter several bugs. We're actively working on resolving those.

**NOTE**: *You might experience excessive Creative queue times due to high load demands. We're actively working on adding new servers.

data.author: [ERA] danii
data.body:
**Season 7 (Version 7.40)** is now available on Project Era servers  
**If you already have 7.40 installed** from a third party launcher, you can import it on the Project Era launcher.
## VOICE CHAT & GIFTING   
**Voice Chat** has been re-added and improved after being disabled for several months. 

**Gifting** has been re-enabled  
## BACKBLINGS & COMPENSATION  
**Item Shop** skins now come with backblings. 

Players have been compensated with every missing backbling that they were meant to receive.
## SKULL TROOPER BACKBLING CHALLENGES  
Owners of the **Skull Trooper** skin were granted the challenges to obtain the Skull Trooper's backbling.
## ZENITH, LYNX CHALLENGES, WEEK 1 & SEASON 7 BATTLE PASS  
The Battle Pass has been updated and **Zenith** and **Lynx** challenges are now available.
## SEASON 7 ROADMAP  
We have also planned several updates: 
* An 11-minutes long **Custom Live Event** will take place in the later stage of **Era Season 7**  
* Tournaments  
* **iOS & Android** support is scheduled to release before *Dec 18*
* **Creative** mode and **14 Days of Fortnite** challenges will release on *Dec 19*

data.author: [ERA] AidasP
data.body:
# THE BUTTERFLY EVENT

Project Era will be re-hosting the **Butterfly Event** for the first time in **5 YEARS**!

The event is set to go live on 2023-12-09 20PM UTC. A second show will be hosted on 2023-12-10 20PM UTC

Anyone who partakes in the event will receive the **Shackled Stone** backbling, and access to the **Lil' Kev Challenges** (Which will grant the **Lil Kev** backbling) 

Make sure not to miss out. See you on the Battle Bus!

*****: The time displays in your local timezone. A live countdown is also available on the Project Era launcher.

data.author: [ERA] AidasP
data.body:
## WEEK 3 & WEEK 4 OUT NOW 
Week 3 & Week 4 challenges are now available 
## UPDATED LAUNCHER
We have made a significant update to our launcher, with a revamped UI for news posts!
## FIXED CHALLENGES
We have patched **some** challenges bug that would now allow progression!
## INSTANT QUEUES NOW OUT OF BETA
We have improved our **Instant Queues** system **fixing several bugs** that appeared after the sudden spike in player activity on Project Era!
Instant Queues are now stable and out of beta.
## RANDOM LOADOUTS 
The "Random" item in the locker finally works! 
## FIXED MUSIC PACKS NOT UNEQUIPPING 
Music packs can now be properly unequipped
## BUTTERFLY EVENT 
The Butterfly Event will **soon** be re-hosted **LIVE** on Project Era servers. 
There will be a **SEPARATE** announcement where we will drop the **EVENT DATE & TIME** aswell as every detail you need to know about! 
Make sure not to miss out 

We hope to see you on the battle bus... and **keep an eye out on the Cube**!

data.author: [ERA] danii
data.body:
## WEEK 2 
Servers are back up! **Week 2** challenges have been granted to everyone! 
## FIXED QUESTS 
"Placement" & "Outlive" daily quests (e.g. **Place Top 50 in Solo**) now work correctly!
## FIXED QUEST REROLLING & COSMETIC VARIANTS 
Quests rerolling is now much faster!
Variants should also be working correctly now. 
## PORT-A-FORTRESS 
The Port-A-Fortress now works correctly.
## WEEKLY LOADING SCREENS 
Weekly loading screens **should** now be correctly granted upon completing a weekly challenges bundle.
## PETS 
Granting pets has been fixed and now works correctly!

data.author: [ERA] danii
data.body:
Season 6 is out now! Download **6.21** from the launcher and have fun! Find out how to play: [tutorial](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R1Ngk9kUIgM)

## INTRODUCING INSTANT QUEUES (BETA)

A brand new matchmaking system has been implemented on Era! The speed of queues will now depend on the number of players online! We also set the maximum amount of time you can spend in a queue: **5 minutes**, after which you will be put into a match.
**NOTE**: Instant Queues will initially be in beta, you may encounter some bugs.
## CHALLENGES UPDATE & COMPENSATION

The challenges system has been improved and to apologize for the issues we had last season, you will get **10 tiers** worth of rewards from the Season 5 battlepass (As long as you were atleast **Tier 10**).

You will also be granted **5 tiers** on the Season 6 battlepass (After playing **ONE** match) if you were atleast **Tier 2** on the Season 5 battlepass.

Backblings have been fixed! You will be given all missing backblings upon logging-in.
Ragnarok and Drift styles challenges are still available for you to complete during **Era Season 6**!
## GAMEPLAY 

Glider Redeploy, Pets, Balloons, The Six Shooter, The Quad Launcher, Shadow Stones & New POIs are now available in-game!

Additionally, we have re-worked the **download services** on our launcher, fixing most download bugs & making it significantly faster!
Will we see you on the Battle Bus?

data.author: Soggs
data.body:
You can now play [iOS](https://youtu.be/Ah7-7mersQg) on Era! Additionally, we have just released **Weekly Challenges 9 & 10** so you could finish off this season's Battle Pass!



## **Patch notes:**
- Week 9 & 10 Challenges are now available.
- Fixed an issue where the launcher would crash when pressing *"Launch on other platforms"*.
- New experimental downloader (in preperation for v6.21!)
- Fixed an issue with the *Lazy Links POI* challenges.

data.author: Soggs
data.body:
Patch notes:
- Added Week 6, Week 7 and Week 8 challenges.
- Fixed leaderboards
- Fixed kick when swapped an item before using a Rift-To-Go
